General.Name: Bathurst Resources Limited
General.Description: Bathurst Resources Limited explores for, develops, and produces coal in New Zealand. It also exports coal. The company was formerly known as Bathurst Resources (New Zealand) Limited and changed its name to Bathurst Resources Limited in December 2013. Bathurst Resources Limited was incorporated in 2013 and is based in Wellington, New Zealand.

1.Name: Mr. Russell Lee Scott Middleton B.Bus., F.Fin, FCPA, GAICD, M.B.A.
1.Title: CFO & Exec. Director
